name: Mrs Gloria
review: Great drone with many advanced features. I had purchased the drone from this website and had fun using it

name: Mr Tim
review: Best product from Mavic, Loved it! Recommended to buy.

name: Mr Nicola
review: This drone is awesome. I have never flown anything in the sky before and was extremely nervous before the first flight!

name: Mrs Windey
review: Heard so many great things and have watched friends fly this drone and it is amazing!

name: Mr Travis
review: I don't even know where to start. This thing is amazing! I found the price hard to swallow, but it was justified once i started flying it.

name: Mr Michael
review: I purchased this as my travel drone that would be easy to take with me on trips or for quick shoots. This impressed me a lot!

name: Mr Hairston
review: This is simply an amazing device!

name: Mr Phil
review: Easy to fly, very fun and great video. I love it!

name: Mr Johan
review: The drone is fantastic, thus five stars. As for how to get started and operate the thing, DJI gets minus 5 stars.
